h4.p: [22] etthantare yaṃ caritaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ bodhipācanaṃ..
[22] imamhi kappe caritaṃ, pavakkhissaṃ suṇohi me..
[22] ajjhogāhetvā {ajjhogahetvā (sī0 syā0)} viharāmi, akitti nāma tāpaso..
[22] mama dvāre ṭhitaṃ disvā, sakaṭāhena ākiriṃ..
[21] ``na tassa dānaṃ dadamāno, yasaṃ lābhañca patthayiṃ.
[22] tattha bījaṃ na ropeti, na so dhaññena atthiko..
[22] yadi tattha kāraṃ na karomi, nāhaṃ puññena atthiko..
[22] na deti tesaṃ dhanadhaññaṃ, muddito parihāyati..
[22] yadi tassa dānaṃ na dadāmi, parihāyissāmi puññato'..
[22] api ca dānaṃ paripūrento, evaṃ tassa adāsaha''nti..
[22] mā me bhijji samādānaṃ, dassāmi vipulaṃ gajaṃ'..
[22] jalaṃ hatthe ākiritvā, brāhmaṇānaṃ adaṃ gajaṃ..
[22] `kiṃ nu tuyhaṃ varaṃ nāgaṃ, yācakānaṃ padassasi..
[22] tasmiṃ nāge padinnamhi, kiṃ te rajjaṃ karissati..
[22] sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā nāgaṃ adāsaha'''nti..
[22] `ko kiṃ icchati pattheti, kassa kiṃ dīyatū dhanaṃ..
[21] ```ko chātako ko tasito, ko mālaṃ ko vilepanaṃ.
[22] iti ^a^T2.0555^ea^ sāyañca pāto ca, ghosāpemi tahiṃ tahiṃ..
[21] ``na taṃ dasasu ṭhānesu, napi ṭhānasatesu vā.
[21] ``divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, yadi eti vanibbako.
[22] napāhaṃ dessaṃ dhanaṃ dammi, napi natthi nicayo mayi..
[22] tena demi mahādānaṃ, akkhobbhaṃ {akkhobhaṃ (syā0 kaṃ0)} sāgarūpamaṃ..
[21] ``na ^a^T2.0556^ea^ ^a^M2.0389^ea^ me dessaṃ dhanaṃ dhaññaṃ, napi natthi nicayo mayi.
[22] sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā demi varaṃ dhana''nti..
[22] yattha lābho mahā hoti, tattha taṃ {tattha naṃ (sī0), tattha (ka0)} harati bhaṇḍakaṃ..
[21] ```yaṃ kiñci mānusaṃ dānaṃ, adinnaṃ me na vijjati.
[22] yopi yāceyya maṃ cakkhuṃ, dadeyyaṃ avikampito'..
[22] cintento vividhaṃ dānaṃ, adeyyaṃ so na passati..
[21] ```tathaṃ ^a^V2.0377^ea^ nu vitathaṃ netaṃ, handa vīmaṃsayāmi taṃ.
[22] muhuttaṃ āgameyyātha, yāva jānāmi taṃ manaṃ'..
[22] ekaṃ me nayanaṃ dehi, tvampi ekena yāpaya'..
[21] ```ehi sivaka uṭṭhehi, mā dandhayi mā pavedhayi.
[21] ``tato ^a^T2.0559^ea^ so codito mayhaṃ, sivako vacanaṃ karo.
[21] ``na me dessā ubho cakkhū, attā na me na dessiyo.
[22] sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā cakkhuṃ adāsaha''nti..
[21] ``yā ^a^V2.0378^ea^ me ahosi janikā, phussatī {phusatī (sī0)} nāma khattiyā.
[22] sā atītāsu jātīsu, sakkassa mahesī piyā..
[21] ``evaṃ vuttā ca sā devī, sakkaṃ punidamabravi.
[27] `kiṃ nu me aparādhatthi, kiṃ nu dessā ahaṃ tava.
[22] rammā cāvesi maṃ ṭhānā, vātova dharaṇīruhaṃ'..
[21] ``evaṃ ^a^M2.0392^ea^ vutto ca so sakko, puna tassidamabravi.
[22] `na ceva te kataṃ pāpaṃ, na ca me tvaṃsi appiyā..
[22] paṭiggaṇha mayā dinne, vare dasa varuttame'..
[22] mamaṃ abbhantaraṃ katvā, phussatī dasa vare varī..
[22] mama tejena me mātā, sadā dānaratā ahu..
[22] samaṇe brāhmaṇe khīṇe, deti dānaṃ akiñcane..
[22] vessānaṃ vīthiyā majjhe, janesi phussatī mamaṃ..
[22] tadā nisajja pāsāde, dānaṃ dātuṃ vicintayiṃ..
[22] dadeyyaṃ kāyaṃ sāvetvā, yadi koci yācaye mamaṃ'..
[21] ``dadāmi na vikampāmi, yaṃ maṃ yācanti brāhmaṇā.
[22] santaṃ nappatigūhāmi {nappatiguyhāmi (sī0 ka0)}, dāne me ramate mano..
[22] `mā me bhijji samādānaṃ, dassāmi vipulaṃ gajaṃ'..
[22] jalaṃ hatthe ākiritvā, brāhmaṇānaṃ adaṃ gajaṃ..
[21] ``hatthiṃ ^a^T2.0562^ea^ asse rathe datvā, dāsiṃ dāsaṃ gavaṃ dhanaṃ.
[21] ```tvaṃ maddi kaṇhaṃ gaṇhāhi, lahukā esā kaniṭṭhikā.
[22] ahaṃ jāliṃ gahessāmi, garuko bhātiko hi so'..
[22] visamaṃ samaṃ akkamantā, vaṅkaṃ gacchāma pabbataṃ..
[21] ``rodante dārake disvā, ubbiddhā {ubbiggā (syā0 kaṃ0)} vipulā dumā.
[22] te tato nikkhamitvāna, vaṅkaṃ agamu pabbataṃ..
[22] caturo janā mayaṃ tattha, vasāma pabbatantare..
[22] maddī phalaṃ āharitvā, poseti sā tayo jane..
[22] āyāci puttake mayhaṃ, jāliṃ kaṇhājinaṃ cubho..
[22] ubho putte gahetvāna, adāsiṃ brāhmaṇe tadā..
[21] ``na me dessā ubho puttā, maddidevī na dessiyā.
[22] sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā piye adāsahaṃ..
[21] ``makkaṭo ca siṅgālo ca, suttapoto cahaṃ tadā.
[22] vasāma ekasāmantā, sāyaṃ pāto ca dissare {sāyaṃ pāto padissare (ka0)}..
[22] `yadihaṃ labhe dakkhiṇeyyaṃ, kiṃ me dānaṃ bhavissati..
[21] ```na ^a^V2.0383^ea^ me atthi tilā muggā, māsā vā taṇḍulā ghataṃ.
[22] ahaṃ tiṇena yāpemi, na sakkā tiṇa dātave..
[21] ```yadi ^a^M2.0397^ea^ koci eti dakkhiṇeyyo, bhikkhāya mama santike.
[22] dajjāhaṃ sakamattānaṃ, na so tuccho gamissati'..
[21] ``aggiṃ tattha padīpesi, yathā so khippaṃ mahā bhave.
[22] sameti darathapariḷāhaṃ, assādaṃ deti pīti ca..
[22] sabbaṃ sameti darathaṃ, yathā sītodakaṃ viya..
[21] nimi candakumāro ca, sivi vessantaro saso.
[22] ahameva tadā āsiṃ, yo te dānavare adā..
[22] jīvitaṃ yācake datvā, imaṃ pārami pūrayiṃ..
[22] dānena me samo natthi, esā me dānapāramīti..
[22] na tadā atthi mahiyā, guṇena mama sādiso..
[22] saha gahite {samaṃ gahite (sī0)} soṇḍāya, sayameva idhehi'ti..
[22] paṭibalo bhave tesaṃ, yāva rajjampi mānusaṃ..
[22] na karomi citte aññathattaṃ, pakkhipantaṃ mamāḷake..
[21] ``yadi te maṃ tattha koṭṭeyyuṃ, pharasūhi tomarehi ca.
[22] yassa etena karaṇīyaṃ, dinnaṃyeva harātu so..
[22] peḷāya pakkhipitvāna, kīḷeti maṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ..
[22] na karomi citte aññathattaṃ, pakkhipantampi peḷake''ti..
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^M2.0401^ea^ yaṃ so vaṇṇaṃ cintayi, nīlaṃva pītalohitaṃ.
[22] yadihaṃ tassa pakuppeyyaṃ, khaṇena chārikaṃ kare..
[22] neva sīlaṃ pabhindeyyaṃ, vikirante bhusaṃ viyā''ti..
[22] upagamma mamaṃ pucchi, `tuyhesā kā kassa bhariyā'..
[21] ``na mesā brāhmaṇī dessā, napi me balaṃ na vijjati.
[22] hotettha ṭhānaṃ mahiṃsānaṃ, koci koci tahiṃ tahiṃ..
[22] taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagantvāna, tiṭṭhāmi ca sayāmi ca..
[22] dūseti maṃ sabbakālaṃ, tena homi upadduto..
[22] `nāsehetaṃ chavaṃ pāpaṃ, siṅgehi ca khurehi ca'..
[21] ``evaṃ ^a^V2.0389^ea^ vutte tadā yakkhe, ahaṃ taṃ idamabraviṃ.
[22] `kiṃ tvaṃ makkhesi kuṇapena, pāpena anariyena maṃ..
[22] sīlañca me pabhijjeyya, viññū ca garaheyyu maṃ..
[22] teva tassa vadhissanti, sā me mutti bhavissati..
[22] evaṃ labhati sappañño, manasā yathā patthita''nti..
[22] puriso gaṅgāya papati, `jīvāmi vā marāmi vā'..
[22] ravanto karuṇaṃ ravaṃ, majjhe gaṅgāya gacchati..
[22] gaṅgāya tīre ṭhatvāna, apucchiṃ `kosi tvaṃ naro'..
[21] ``so me puṭṭho ca byākāsi, attano karaṇaṃ tadā.
[22] `ekaṃ taṃ varaṃ yācāmi, mā maṃ kassaci pāvada'..
[27] rājā sutvāna vacanaṃ, usuṃ tassa pakappayi.
[22] sīlavā hi tadā āsiṃ, bodhiyāyeva kāraṇā''ti..
[22] ahaṃ vasāmi upari, heṭṭhā vasati brāhmaṇo..
[21] ``yadihaṃ tassa pakuppeyyaṃ, yadi sīlaṃ na gopaye.
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^P0.0089^ea^ so tadā maṃ abhisapi, kupito duṭṭhamānaso.
[22] tasseva matthake nipati, yogena taṃ pamocayiṃ..
[22] sīlavā hi tadā āsiṃ, bodhiyāyeva kāraṇā''ti..
[22] dhure dhuraṃ ghaṭṭayantā, samimhā paṭipathe ubho..
[22] so me pitumaggahesi, `bhakkhosi mama mā cali'..
[22] brāhmaṇassa dhanaṃ datvā, pitā āmantayī mamaṃ..
[21] ```rajjaṃ putta paṭipajja, mā pamajji puraṃ idaṃ.
[22] kataṃ me porisādena, mama āgamanaṃ puna'..
[22] tena bhijjissati sīlaṃ, parittāsaṃ {paritāsaṃ (sī0)} kate mayi..
[22] yassa etena karaṇīyaṃ, dinnaṃyeva harātu so..
[22] bhojaputte na kuppāmi, esā me sīlapāramī''ti..
[22] ruru mātaṅgo dhammo ca, atrajo ca jayaddiso..
[22] yassa kassaci niyyattaṃ, tasmā sā sīlapāramīti..
[21] ``mātāpitā na me dessā, napi me dessaṃ mahāyasaṃ.
[22] sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā rajjaṃ pariccaji''nti..
[22] taṃ nisedhetuṃ gacchanto, anusāsi pitā mamaṃ..
[22] `kacci te gahapati kusalaṃ, kiṃ vā te āharīyatu'..
[22] `kacci te bhante khamanīyaṃ, sammāno te pavattito'..
[22] tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, āṇāpesi mahīpati..
[22] rathiyā rathiyaṃ dassetha, sā gati jaṭilahīḷitā'..
[22] `rañño dassetha maṃ khippaṃ, rājakiriyāni atthi me'..
[21] ``na ^a^V2.0396^ea^ me dessaṃ mahārajjaṃ, kāmabhogo na dessiyo.
[22] sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā rajjaṃ pariccaji''nti..
[22] ajjeva putta paṭipajja, kevalaṃ vasudhaṃ imaṃ..
[22] rajjesu yadi rajjāmi {rañjāmi (sī0)}, pāpānaṃ uttamo siyaṃ..
[22] nibbutiṃ pariyesissaṃ, yattha maṃ maccu na maddiye'..
[22] nāgova bandhanaṃ chetvā, pāvisiṃ kānanaṃ vanaṃ..
[21] ``mātāpitā ^a^T2.0583^ea^ ^a^V2.0397^ea^ na me dessā, napi me dessaṃ mahāyasaṃ.
[22] sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā rajjaṃ pariccaji''nti..
[22] bhaginī ca bhātaro satta, nibbattā sotthiye kule..
[22] taṃ me ahosi kaṭhinaṃ, tatta {santatta (ka0)} phālasamaṃ viya..
[21] ``te maṃ tadā ukkhipantaṃ, pucchiṃsu patthitaṃ mama.
[22] `kiṃ tvaṃ patthayase samma, yadi kāme na bhuñjasi'..
[21] ``te mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, pitumātu ca sāvayuṃ.
[21] ``ubho ^a^T2.0584^ea^ mātāpitā mayhaṃ, bhaginī ca satta bhātaro.
[21] ``yo ^a^M2.0412^ea^ me kaniṭṭhako bhātā, nando nāmāsi paṇḍito.
[21] ``ahaṃ soṇo ca nando ca, ubho mātāpitā mama.
[22] setacchattaṃ dhārayitvāna, sayane poseti maṃ pitā..
[22] addasaṃ paṇḍaraṃ chattaṃ, yenāhaṃ nirayaṃ gato..
[21] ``saha ^a^V2.0399^ea^ diṭṭhassa me chattaṃ, tāso uppajji bheravo.
[22] sā maṃ disvāna dukkhitaṃ, tīsu ṭhānesu yojayi..
[22] sabbo taṃ jano ocināyatu, evaṃ tava attho bhavissati'..
[22] `karomi te taṃ vacanaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ bhaṇasi devate.
[22] ete aṅge adhiṭṭhāya, vassāni soḷasaṃ vasiṃ..
[21] ``tato me hatthapāde ca, jivhaṃ sotañca maddiya.
[22] yassatthāya tapociṇṇo, so me attho samijjhatha..
[22] sārathī khaṇatī kāsuṃ, nikhātuṃ pathaviyā mamaṃ..
[21] ``mātāpitā na me dessā, attā me na ca dessiyo.
[22] adhiṭṭhānena me samo natthi, esā me adhiṭṭhānapāramī''ti..
[21] ``na tassa alikaṃ bhaṇitaṃ, yathā vācaṃ akāsahaṃ.
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī''ti..
[22] tassā phassena jīvāmi, natthi me kāyikaṃ balaṃ..
[21] ``pāde ^a^M2.0415^ea^ pakkhe pajahāmi, natthi me kāyikaṃ balaṃ.
[22] sohaṃ agatiko tattha, evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā..
[22] te maṃ ohāya pakkantā, kathaṃ me ajja kātave..
[27] vajjesi soḷasakarīsāni, udakaṃ patvā yathā sikhī.
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī''ti..
[21] ``tato kākā ca gijjhā ca, kaṅkā {bakā (sī0)} kulalasenakā.
[22] `kena nu kho upāyena, ñātī dukkhā pamocaye'..
[22] sacce ṭhatvā pamocesiṃ, ñātīnaṃ taṃ atikkhayaṃ..
[22] kākaṃ sokāya randhehi, macche sokā pamocaya'..
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī''ti..
[22] ahañhi kassaci nācikkhiṃ, arati me carati mānase..
[22] tenāhaṃ dukkhito āsiṃ, mama vāhasi taṃ dukkhaṃ..
[22] paṭhamaṃ akāsiṃ kiriyaṃ, aggaṃ saccaṃ varuttamaṃ..
[22] athāparaṃ yaṃ caritaṃ mamedaṃ, vassāni paññāsasamādhikāni..
[21] ```akāmako vāhi ahaṃ carāmi, etena saccena suvatthi hotu.
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī''ti..
[22] yathāmati te kāhāmi, yadi me tvaṃ punehisi'..
[22] upagantvā puraṃ rammaṃ, rajjaṃ niyyādayiṃ tadā..
[21] ``natthi me saṃsayo tattha, ghātayissati vā na vā.
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esā me saccapāramī''ti..
[21] ``na maṃ koci uttasati, napi bhāyāmi kassaci.
[21] ``evaṃ me appamattassa, idha loke parattha ca.
[22] sabbaṃ hatthagataṃ katvā, kāsuyā nikhaṇī mamaṃ..
[22] mettāya me samo natthi, esā me mettāpāramī''ti..
[21] ``ye me dukkhaṃ upaharanti, ye ca denti sukhaṃ mama.
[22] sabbesaṃ samako homi, dayā kopo na vijjati..
[22] sabbattha samako homi, esā me upekkhāpāramī''ti..
[27] sutasomo puna āsiṃ {āsi (syā0)}, sāmo ca ekarājahu.
[22] upekkhāpāramī āsi, iti vutthaṃ {vuttaṃ (sabbattha) aṭṭhakathā oloketabbā} mahesinā..
[21] evaṃ ^a^M2.0420^ea^ bahubbidhaṃ dukkhaṃ, sampattī ca bahubbidhā {sampatti ca bahuvidhā (sī0), sampattiṃ ca bahuvidhaṃ (ka0)}.
[21] datvā dātabbakaṃ dānaṃ, sīlaṃ pūretvā asesato.
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā attano pubbacariyaṃ sambhāvayamāno buddhāpadāniyaṃ nāma dhammapariyāyaṃ abhāsitthāti.
